TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Engine extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class has been deprecated. Please use Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.ProjectCollection from the Microsoft.Build assembly instead.")

summary.span: Represents the MSBuild engine.

span.span: Represents the MSBuild engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在系統中的專案對專案相依性，維護建置專案，讓您可以避免在同一個專案相同的目標建置一次以上指定的組建。In a system of project-to-project dependencies, the maintains the building projects, making it possible to avoid building the same target in the same project more than once in a given build. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並使用方法，以建置專案檔。The following example creates an object and uses the method to build a project file. 類別用來將資訊記錄到檔案。The class is used to log information to a file. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BuildAProject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BuildAProject/CS/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_BuildAProject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BuildAProject/VB/Module1.vb#1)]

member this.BinPath : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Avoid setting BinPath. If you were simply passing in the .NET Framework location as the BinPath, no other action is necessary. Otherwise, define Toolsets instead in the registry or config file, or by adding elements to the Engine's ToolsetCollection, in order to use a custom BinPath.")

summary.span: Gets or sets the path to MSBuild.exe.

span.span: Gets or sets the path to MSBuild.exe.
The path to MSBuild.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 3.5"ToolsPath。 」 取代 「 bin 路徑 」In [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 3.5, the "BinPath" is superseded by the "ToolsPath." 因此，在。目標檔案，請使用 MSBuildToolsPath，而不是 MBBuildBinPath。Therefore, in the .Targets file, use MSBuildToolsPath rather than MBBuildBinPath. 在 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]物件模型中，您正在執行的工具組與 「 bin 路徑 」。In the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] object model, "BinPath" relates to the Toolset you are running. 若要從建置引擎取得路徑步驟如下所示：The steps to get the path from the build engine are as follows: 1. 取得預設工具版本。Get the default tools version. 2. 取得工具組對應。Get the Toolset map. 3. 尋找工具組，並根據在對應中的字串。Find the Toolset, based on the string in the map. 4. 取得工具組。Get the Toolset. 5. 從工具組中取得的路徑。Get the path from the Toolset. 如果您要建立的引擎，則不需要執行此程序。This procedure is not required if you are creating the engine. 在此情況下，您已經知道的工具組路徑。In that case, you already know the Toolset path. 因為方案中的專案可以使用不同的工具組，您也可以取得 MSBuild.exe 的路徑從專案，如下所示。Because projects in a solution can use different Toolsets, you can also obtain the MSBuild.exe path from the project, as follows. ``` project.EvaluatedProperties[ReservedPropertyNames.toolsPath].FinalValue ``` 如需有關工具組的詳細資訊，請參閱`MSBuild Tool Set (ToolsVersion)`。For more information about Toolsets, see `MSBuild Tool Set (ToolsVersion)`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並使用方法，以建置專案檔。The following example creates an object and uses the method to build a project file. 類別用來將資訊記錄到檔案。The class is used to log information to a file. if the build succeeds; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載會採用一組全域屬性中的每個要用於建置的專案，會傳回目標輸出中，而且也可讓呼叫者指定其他組建旗標。This overload takes a set of global properties for each project to use for the build, returns the target outputs, and also enables the caller to specify additional build flags.

summary.span: The default ToolsVersion of this build engine.

value.span: 表示預設 ToolsVersion 的字串。

span.span: A string that represents the default ToolsVersion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它們不否則會獲告知要使用哪一個 ToolsVersion，專案會使用此工具版本。Projects use this ToolsVersion if they are not otherwise told which ToolsVersion to use. 這個值擷取自。 .exe.config 檔案或登錄。This value is retrieved from either the .exe.config file or the registry. 如果未指定預設 ToolsVersion，則版本是硬式編碼為版本"2.0"。If neither specify a default ToolsVersion, then the version is hard-coded to version "2.0." 如需 ToolsVersion 的詳細資訊，請參閱[專為特定版本的.NET Framework 建置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8)。For more information about ToolsVersion, see [Building for Specific Versions of the .NET Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是安全執行緒。This method is not thread-safe. 若要確保一致的行為，建置開始之前，應該註冊所有記錄器。To ensure uniform behavior, all loggers should register before the build is started. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[撰寫能夠辨識多處理器的記錄器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff987d1b-1798-4803-9ef6-cc8fcc263516)。For more information, see [Writing Multi-Processor-Aware Loggers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff987d1b-1798-4803-9ef6-cc8fcc263516).
